Subset_Questions.ID: What is the ID of the Subset?
Subset_Questions.Name: What is the name of the subset?
Subset_Questions.LastUpdate: When was the subset last updated?
Subset_Questions.Modality: What is the modality of the subset? (The type of data)
Subset_Questions.Format: What is the format or the schema of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Size: What is the size of the subset? (Number of rows if it's a table or files if it's a directory)
Subset_Questions.Parent: What is the ID of the parent of the subset? (Use 0 if none)
Subset_Questions.Purpose: What is the purpose of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Link: What is the link (URL) to further description of the subset?
Subset_Questions.Covmat: Have you calculated a covariance matrix (or similar) and made it available in this dataset? Where?
Subset_Questions.Modsys: Have you modeled all (or a few) features and made the models accessible in this dataset? Where?

Feature_Questions.ID: What is the ID of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Subset: What is the ID of the reference subset of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Introduction: What is the introduction date of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Name: What is the name of the feature?
Feature_Questions.Values: What are the values that the feature might take?
Feature_Questions.Meaning_NA_NULL_NONE_OTHER: What special meaning does NA, NULL, NONE, or any other placeholder have with respect to this feature?
Feature_Questions.Meaning_Zero: What is the meaning of the feature if it is zero?
Feature_Questions.Meaning_BlankVoid: What does it mean if no value is to be found?
Feature_Questions.Sparsity: What level of non-zero sparsity is there?
Feature_Questions.Mean: What is the mean if the feature is nummeric?
Feature_Questions.Std: What is the standard deviation if the feature is numeric?
Feature_Questions.Modality: How many modes does the feature have?
Feature_Questions.IQR: What is the inter quartile range?
Feature_Questions.ParentIDs: What is the ID of the parent feature (If derived from other features)
Feature_Questions.Unit: What unit is this feature in?
Feature_Questions.Purpose: Why does the feature exist or is it superfluous?
Feature_Questions.Encoding: State whether the feature is encoded and what the mapping is.

Subset_1.Name: Stability assay
Subset_1.Purpose: Measurements of peptide:MHC stability. ELISA measurement, quantitative labels.

Feature_1.Name: Peptide
Feature_1.Definition: Combination of amino acids making up the peptide.
Feature_1.Purpose: Different combinations of amino acids yield different binding affinities; can we predict this based solely on any given combination?

Feature_2.Name: ELISA_Stability
Feature_2.Definition: A measure of MHC binding stability as determined by ELISA.
Feature_2.Purpose: A measure of MHC binding stability as determined by ELISA.

Subset_2.Name: MS dataset 1
Subset_2.Purpose: Measurements of peptide:MHC binding. Mass Spectroscopy, binary labels.

Feature_1.Name: Peptide
Feature_1.Definition: Combination of amino acids making up the peptide.
Feature_1.Purpose: Different combinations of amino acids yield different binding affinities; can we predict this based solely on any given combination?

Feature_2.Name: MASS_Bind
Feature_2.Definition: A YES/NO on whether binding is detected by Mass spec.
Feature_2.Purpose: A YES/NO on whether binding is detected by Mass spec.
